name: @graffio/types-generation
description: Build tools for compile-time type generation

scripts.types:generate: find . -name '*.type.js' -exec sh -c 'bash/generate-type-file.sh "$1"' _ {} \; && node src/generate-index-file.js test/generated && node src/generate-index-file.js src/generated
scripts.types:watch: onchange 'test/types/*.type.js' 'src/types/*.type.js' -- sh -c 'bash/generate-type-file.sh {{file}} && node src/generate-index-file.js test/generated && node src/generate-index-file.js src/generated'
